headerDisplay:
Tap *Add Accessory*, and select *I Don't Have a Code or Cannot Scan*.
4. Enter the Homebridge PIN, this can be found under the QR code in Homebridge UI or your Homebridge logs, alternatively you can select *Use Camera* and scan the QR code again.

For help and examples of common configurations please read the [wiki](https://github.com/KhaosT/homebridge-camera-ffmpeg/wiki).
footerDisplay: The **ffmpeg** binary must be installed on your system for this plugin to work.

autoConfig.title: Autoconfigure
autoConfig.description: If selected the Plugin searches for bridges and adds all devices. U need to touch the Bridge button in Parring process

ip.title: IP Address
ip.description: Local IP Address of the Device which runs this Homebridge Instance. Leave empty for Auto-Detection.

port.title: Port
port.description: Choose a open Port on this Device. Leave empty for default Port.

bridges.description: Static Bridge Configuration. Leave empty for dynamic configuration.

unsecureLockService.title: Unsecure Lock Service?
unsecureLockService.description: Will expose the Lock-Service as Switch. Can be used in Automations without confirmation.

unlatchWhenLocked.title: Unlatch When Locked?
unlatchWhenLocked.description: When enabled the Door can be unlatched even the Door is locked.

rtoSwitchService.title: Ring to Open Service Switch
rtoSwitchService.description: Expose a Switch to set Ring to Open state

continuousModeSwitchService.title: Continuous Mode Service Switch
continuousModeSwitchService.description: Expose a Switch to set Continuous Mode state

doorbellService.title: Doorbell Service Switch
doorbellService.description: Expose a Contactsensor that react ons Doorbell Ring while not in RTO or Continuous Mode

openerSoundService.title: Mute / Unmute Opener Ring Switch
openerSoundService.description: Expose a Switch to Mute / Unmute Opener Sound Switch over the Nuki Web Api. Needs an WebApi Access Token

doorbellSoundService.title: Mute / Unmute Doorbell Ring Switch
doorbellSoundService.description: Expose a Switch to Mute / Unmute Doorbell Ring Switch over the Nuki Web Api. Needs an WebApi Access Token
